mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVELLIST (title, contentid, firstimage, mapx, mapy, addr1, addr2, areacode, cat1, cat2, cat3 ,sigungucode ,contenttypeid) VALUES (#{title}, #{contentid}, #{firstimage}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{areacode}, #{cat1}, #{cat2}, #{cat3} , #{sigungucode} ,#{contenttypeid})
